clonePOLines.modifyInfo: Review the modifications that will be applied to the cloned PO Line in an attempt to set its status to 'In Review' (this depends on the system configuration).

config.allowUsageExplanation: The following settings can be used to manage the use of the app. If no configuration is made, all users are allowed. An explicit entry in the list of allowed users always has access, regardless of the roles.
config.allowUsersWithRoleText: Allow usage for users with the following roles:
config.confirmRemoveConfig: Do you really want to remove the configuration?
config.moduleRestrictionsExplanation: Module restrictions allow you to control access to specific modules within the application. You can restrict access based on user roles or by explicitly selecting individual users. If no restrictions are set for a module, all users will have access by default.
config.rolesAndUsersAreExclusive: If there are users in the allow list, roles will not be checked

createItems.title: Create Items to existent Holdings
createItems.validationInfoHeader: The file will be validated for the following checks:
createItems.validationInfoPoint1: 1. The file must be in CSV format.
createItems.validationInfoPoint2: 2. The first row must contain valid headers. Click to review the allowed headers.
createItems.validationInfoPoint3: 3. All rows must have the same number of columns.

validationInfoPoint4.text: 4. For fields with controlled values (dropdown fields), it is necessary to specify the configuration code, not the description.

error.headers: Invalid column format. Ensure the columns match: MMS ID, Holding ID, Phyisical ID, fieldItemX...

warning.partialSuccess: Some records were created, but there were also errors

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.developedBy: This cloud application has been developed by
disclaimer.noResponsibility: We are not responsible for any issues arising from record modifications. The responsibility lies solely with the user executing the processes.
disclaimer.dataSent: Additionally, certain data is sent for statistical purposes, such as the number of successfully processed records, errors, process type, and the IZ code initiating the process.
disclaimer.privacy: We do not store any personal details or information belonging to users.

errors.emptyInvalid: CSV file is empty or invalid.

modifyHoldings.title: Modify Holdings Field
modifyHoldings.validationInfoHeader: The file will be validated for the following checks:
modifyHoldings.validationInfoPoint1: 1. The file must be in CSV format.
modifyHoldings.validationInfoPoint2: 2. The first row must contain valid headers. Click to review the allowed headers.
modifyHoldings.validationInfoPoint3: 3. All rows must have the same number of columns.
modifyHoldings.changesExactContent: The changes will always be based on exact content.
modifyHoldings.apiLimitations: It is not possible to create result sets due to an API limitation. Holding identifiers cannot be added to holding sets.

error.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a CSV.
error.invalidHeaders: Invalid headers, check for allowed headers
error.invalidHeaderBarcode: Invalid header. The first column must be 'Barcode' for 3-column files.
error.invalidHeaderMMS: Invalid headers. The first three columns must be 'MMS ID', 'Holding ID', and 'Physical ID' for 5-column files.
error.invalidHeaderHolding: Invalid headers. The first two columns must be 'MMS ID', 'Holding ID'.
error.invalidHeaderColumnCount: Invalid number of columns in the header row. Expected {{expected}}, but got {{actual}}.
error.mismatchedColumns: Row {{row}} has a mismatched number of columns. Expected {{expected}}, but got {{actual}}.
error.duplicateKey: Duplicate entry found for '{{key}}' in row {{row}}.
error.fileReadError: An error occurred while reading the file.
error.fileTooLarge: The file is too large. Maximum size allowed is {{maxSize}}.
